title: Full-stack - Michał Bodys
description: Full-stack from Poland. Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript

hero.title: Hello I'm Michał Bodys!
hero.description: I am dedicated to creating modern and efficient web applications, placing a strong emphasis on exceptional user experiences and innovative problem-solving approaches. I am open to new and inspiring challenges!

projects.title: B2B Platform
projects.description: Maintenance and upkeep of a B2B website for a renewable energy company, development of sales systems and order management solutions for clients, as well as enhancement of the admin panel with features for customer support, reporting, and systems for package sales and notifications for Polish and international branches.

projects.title: Speach therapist
projects.description: A promotional website for a speech therapy clinic featuring an admin management system that allows streamlined control and content updates. The platform supports blogging capabilities through seamless integration with a headless CMS, offering flexibility and scalability.

projects.title: ToDo list
projects.description: A simple to-do list application that allows the creation of new categories, marking lists as favorites, and adding various tasks to individual lists. It’s intuitive and helps efficiently manage daily tasks and organize work.

projects.title: Music App
projects.description: A music application that allows new users to register, upload their own music tracks, and leave comments. All features are exclusively available to logged-in users.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I am an ambitious full-stack developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions
about.description: I thrive in collaborative environments where I can share ideas, learn, and grow while also valuing independence and the satisfaction of accomplishing tasks on my own. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that enhance functionality and user experience, I draw inspiration and energy from staying active—football, snowboarding, and running help me find balance and tackle new challenges.

contact.title: Let’s work together!
contact.subtitle: I am open to new challenges and eager to take on exciting projects!
